GisILinearRing
GetCount
GetItem
GetItemByMembers
GetOrdinates
GetPositions

virtual GISGEOM_API void GisILinearRing::GetItemByMembers (  GisInt32  index,
double *  x,
double *  y,
double *  z,
double *  m,
GisInt32 *  dimensionality
)  const [pure virtual]
 

Gets the position at the specified (zero-based) index, by values of its member data. This is in aid of higher performance for any implementation that does not internally use GisIDirectPosition objects for storage, or for an application seeking to avoid overhead of accessor methods.

Parameters:
index Input Zero-based index in the object's list of positions.
x Output X ordinate value.
y Output Y ordinate value.
z Output Z ordinate value.
m Output M ordinate value.
dimensionality Output Dimensionality of ordinates in this position.
Returns:
Returns nothing
Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
